Created with Unity 2017.4.3f1
Required UMA 2.7

The Pack contain 3 Types of Amours for male and female character.
1.Male/Female - Type.1a and Type1b
2.Male/Female - Type.2a and Type2b
3.Male/Female - Type.3a and Type3b

One Armour Type contain:
1.Boots
2.Gloves
3.Helm
4.Legs
5.Torso

Textures are 2048x2048.
Textures are made in such way to be easily editable, especially the colors and the shade of the colors!
The path for Wardrobe_Recipe, Slot and Overlay are separated into separate folders for every types of armours!

Example - Male Type 1a:
Eci Armours Pack1/UMA/MaleType1a/BootsMalePack1Type1a
Eci Armours Pack1/UMA/MaleType1a/GlovesMalePack1Type1a
Eci Armours Pack1/UMA/MaleType1a/HelmMalePack1Type1a
Eci Armours Pack1/UMA/MaleType1a/LegsMalePack1Type1a
Eci Armours Pack1/UMA/MaleType1a/TorsoMalePack1Type1a
